title: Tours4fun Launches New Mobile App with On-the-Go Features
text:
Content preferences Done 
LOS ANGELES, Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Tours4fun, a Ctrip ( CTRP ) company offering a robust and ever-growing selection of tour and travel services, has announced the launch of a new mobile app for Android and iOS with innovate features to assist the customer en route to their dream destination. Version 4.0 gives the customer the option to view recent bookings and e-tickets, so that they can access this vital information when and where it is really needed: At the airport when meeting their driver, at the pick-up point when boarding, or at the hotel when checking in. View photo . 
More importantly, the app gives users the ability to browse thousands of products and services anytime, anywhere. With the Tours4fun app, securing your real-time needs - airport shuttle service and hotel accommodations - on the go is now easier than ever. When paired with Tours4fun's 24/7 multilingual customer service, the app completely obviates the need to seek out the assistance of dubious local agents who may or may not be offering you a fair price. 
The new-and-improved app is now available for download in the Google Play store and the App Store, for Android and iOS, respectively. 
About Tours4fun Tours4fun , a Ctrip ( CTRP ) company, is a full-service online tour and travel superstore offering a wide range of products and services geared toward intrepid travelers as well as those vacationing for the first time. Our experts have searched the globe to find the best and most affordable tours and activities from trusted local suppliers. Thanks to our strategic partnership with major online travel agencies, we now offer accommodation at discounted rates at more than 85,000 hotels around the world. Our mission: To offer a global inventory of handpicked tours and activities geared toward independent travelers at the best price-in-class, with optimal ease of purchase. Collaborating with local travel experts around the world, Tours4fun designs flexible tour packages that save travelers time and money. 
About Ctrip.com International, Ltd Ctrip.com International, Ltd. is a leading travel service provider of accommodation reservation, transportation ticketing, packaged tours, and corporate travel management in China. It is the largest online consolidator of accommodations and transportation tickets in China in terms of transaction volume. Ctrip enables business and leisure travelers to make informed and cost-effective bookings by aggregating comprehensive travel related information and offering its services through an advanced transaction and service platform consisting of its mobile apps, Internet websites and centralized, toll-free, 24-hour customer service center. Ctrip also helps customers book vacation packages and guided tours. In addition, through its corporate travel management services, Ctrip helps corporate clients effectively manage their travel requirements. Since its inception in 1999, Ctrip has experienced substantial growth and become one of the best-known travel brands in China.
